pages.text: $(item)Toma Root$() is a Vegetable Food item that can be grown by planting $(item)Toma Root Seeds$().$(br)Harvesting fully-grown corn yields from 1 to 5 toma roots and no seeds per crop harvested.$(br)$(item)Toma Root$() can be used as an ingredient in several $(pot)Crock Pot$() recipes like $(item)Salsa Fresca$() and has a vegetable value of 1 in the recipes.
$(item)Toma Root Seeds$() can be obtained from breaking all variants of grass, which yields 0 to 1 seed.$(br2)It also can be crafted by the Toma Root in the Crafting Table.
